title: G-PAIE . Payroll Management Platform
excerpt: Full-stack web app for managing organizational payroll processes with PHP, Bootstrap and MySQL.
overview: Developed full-stack web applications for managing payroll processes within an organization.
features: User authentication and authorization for secure access.
Employee management with detailed profiles and salary information.
Payroll processing with automated calculations and tax deductions.

title: Checkers Game
excerpt: Desktop Checkers game developed with C and GTK+ for a rich graphical user experience.
overview: Developed desktop game "Checkers" using C programming language and GTK graphical user interface.
features: Classic Checkers gameplay with a rich graphical user interface.
Single-player mode against AI for challenging gameplay.
AI with varying difficulty levels to suit all players.
AI vs AI mode for automated gameplay.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
excerpt: A desktop Tic-Tac-Toe game developed with Java and JavaFX.
overview: Developed a desktop Tic-Tac-Toe game using Java and JavaFX, implementing the Minimax algorithm for AI decision-making and ensuring an engaging user experience.
features: Classic Tic-Tac-Toe gameplay with a modern graphical user interface.
Single-player mode against an AI opponent using the Minimax algorithm.
Two-player mode for local competitive gameplay.
